attributes.action: Add to the Sexual Orientation Regulations a conscience clause for Christians.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We love Jesus so much that we would grieve Him a lot by not being allowed, by law, to follow our conscience when He tells us that gay practice contravenes the bible.  We love gay people and are aware that their lifestyle has led the NHS to prohibit some of them to donate blood, because of the health risks involved.  We cringe at the society that this legislation is helping to create - a society of people being branded as criminals for honestly following the dictates of their conscience.  Is this really just and fair?
